subtitle: 2X Rewards on Halloween Deathmatches
content:
Take part in the eternal battle between Good and Evil across three new Halloween Deathmatches: Drop Dead, Damned and Lost, and Suck It Up. Plus, mount up as either the Riders or the Hunted in Judgement Day â€” all paying out double to GTA+ Members through November 2.

GTA+ Membership automatically renews monthly, cancel any time. Visit rsg.ms/gtaplus for more info.
